ISSUE.TITLE: "Cannot update your own roles." warning is displayed when a user update their own profile
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug When a user is able to update their own info (/Admin/Users/Edit) we do not allow them to change their own roles unless they have a `SiteOwner` access. However, we display a warning that say `Cannot update your own roles.` The warning should not be displayed as the user does not see a role selector on the UI.
